text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222588006 (null)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222590007 (null)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222596001 (null)

name: TNMRegionalNodesCategoryVS
title: TNM Regional Nodes Category Value Set
description: Result values for AJCC N category. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of AJCC codes for the N category, according to AJCC TNM staging rules.
